title.narrative: Supporting the incorporation of climate risk assessment in Shanghai's Water Supply Infrastructure Strategy

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon UK expertise to influence the Shanghai government's water sector asset investment policy, by providing a robust framework for Climate Change vulnerability assessment. There is potential for such assessment to be replicated to other regions of China. The project will also generate business opportunities for international businesses, including from the UK, to provide equipment, technology and consulting services to the Chinese authorities.
